name: Cassettes: DISQUIET
description:
Your own mind.

Your own struggles.

Your own life.

All you can do is try. All you can do is fight.

_________________________________________________

X to Attack
Up, Left, Right to Move
Backspace to pause

Please give me your feedback! I am releasing several "Tracks" or "Chapters" of this project over time. Track 2 will be coming out in early 2020, and Track 3 will probably be in the same year. If you experience any bugs, please send me the bug reports if possible!

Thanks! I love you! Bye!
